pages.text: $(li)The Golden Hoe is the worst hoe that you can have because its durability is the lowest compared even to the $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/wooden_hoe)Wooden Hoe$(/l).

pages.name: Golden Hoe
pages.text: You can right click in a Grass or Dirt block while you are holding it in your hand to create Farmland.
